name: Wand of Fireballs
description: This wand has 7 charges and regains 1d6+1 expended charges daily at dawn

effects.name: Fireball
effects.description: While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the fireball spell (save DC 15) from it. For 1 charge, you cast the 3rd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
